messages.m: Your Name Here? Yep, do you have any cool Magento Performance Open Source tool/article you want to share to the world? Send issue to Github and maybe we post it!
Mage.coach is online Web Performance tool for monitoring Magento Performance improvements. Check out Mage Coach for more stuff!
The Mage.coach logo is made by Mochamad Arief, you can find his stuff at http://www.mochawalk.com/.
Need help fixing your Magento Performance, contact SupportDesk here, they are glad to help you on all details.
Did you know that 80% of performance optimization related to the frontend and 20% to the server setup. So tune your Magento theme as much as you can, user experience guaranteed!
